About Me

My name is Zack, I am a recent grad from Carleton College, with a bachelor's degree in mathematics. I am currently 22 years old working remotely as a data analyst at Slingwave, living in New Jersey.

I am looking to pursue a career in data science and will hopefully get my Masters in a couple years. My interest in statistics coupled with my background in CS makes data science the perfect intersection for me!
